metadata.title: CVE-2024-0775 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the __ext4_remount in fs/ext4/super.c inext4 in the Linux kernel. This flaw allows a local user to cause aninformation leak problem while freeing the old quota file names before apotential failure, leading to a use-after-free.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
